programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1804
programme.desc: Black History Month - UFC Unleashed is celebrating Black History Month with a look at some of 2022s most exciting fights to come from our roster of black athletes. Featuring Joaquin Buckley, Jared Cannonier, Chris Barnett, and more.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC290MorenovsPantoja2
programme.desc: At UFC 290, Brandon Moreno faced the toughest test of his championship reign in a rematch against Alexandre Pantoja. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their bout on this episode of UFC Main Event.

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep704
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Origins: Kayla Harrison, Fighter Focus: Jim Miller, Ultimate Access: Chute Boxe, Day 1: Cody Garbrandt - Olympic Judo world champion Kayla Harrison details her transition into MMA, revealing her resilience through childhood abuse, and channeling her pain into athletic triumphs. The UFCs marathon man looks back at this record-breaking career and details his approach to the fight game that has seen him compete at the sports highest level for decades. Exclusive access to a special ceremony held at the original site of the Chute Boxe academy where Charles Oliveira is awarded his black belt by Chute Boxe founder Rudimar Fedrigo. Former Bantamweight champion Cody Garbrandt looks back at the impressive UFC debut performance that launched his decorated career.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS - Predatory finishing & net-busting missiles from long range. A celebration of Quique de Lucas one of LaLigas longest serving attacking talents.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC301PantojavsErceg
programme.desc: UFC flyweight champion Alexandre Pantoja returns home to Brazil to defend his crown for the second time against surging Australian contender Steve Erceg in the main event, and Hall-of-Fame legend Jose Aldo comes out of retirement to face rapidly rising phenom Jonathan Martinez. Plus, Anthony "Lionheart" Smith vs Vitor Petrino and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep6
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep29
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback Ep903UFC252MiocicvsCormier3
programme.desc: An enhanced replay of the sports biggest fights, featuring never-before-seen footage from specialty cams.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC300PereiravsHill
programme.desc: Over 30 years in the making, UFC celebrates its 300th numbered event with 3 title fights and a stacked card. Alex Pereira defends his Light Heavyweight belt againt former champ Jamahal Hill, Zhang Weili puts her Strawweight title on the line against Yan Xiaonan in the first ever UFC China vs China championship bout, and Justin Gaethje battles Max Holloway to keep his coveted BMF belt. Catch all this and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC The Walk Ep401UFC262
programme.desc: Oliveira vs Chandler - In 2021, UFC veteran Charles Oliveira and highly-touted newcomer Michael Chandler competed for the vacant lightweight title. Watch both athletes' journeys to the Octagon and relive Charles' historic come-back performance to claim the belt.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC290MorenovsPantoja2
programme.desc: At UFC 290, Brandon Moreno faced the toughest test of his championship reign in a rematch against Alexandre Pantoja. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their bout on this episode of UFC Main Event.

programme.title: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA
programme.desc: LALIGA LEGENDS PEP GUARDIOLA - More than a title-winning machine, Pep Guardiola changed the face of football. Trace the evolution of his famed tiki-taka style of play that propelled the likes of Messi, Xavi, Iniesta and Busquets to footballing royalty.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Pereira vs. Hernandez
programme.desc: Prelims - Currently on an eight-fight winning streak that includes four consecutive post-fight performance bonuses, Brazils Michel Pereira is on the fast track to big things in the middleweight division, but to move to the next level, he must first get by the dangerous Anthony Hernandez in the main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas on October 19. Winner of five straight, with his last three victories ending before the final horn, Hernandez has been deadly with his submission game, as well as his striking, making him a tough puzzle to figure out for Pereira, who has been unstoppable since moving to the middleweight division a year ago.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Pereira vs. Hernandez
programme.desc: Main Event - Currently on an eight-fight winning streak that includes four consecutive post-fight performance bonuses, Brazils Michel Pereira is on the fast track to big things in the middleweight division, but to move to the next level, he must first get by the dangerous Anthony Hernandez in the main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas on October 19. Winner of five straight, with his last three victories ending before the final horn, Hernandez has been deadly with his submission game, as well as his striking, making him a tough puzzle to figure out for Pereira, who has been unstoppable since moving to the middleweight division a year ago.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Royval vs. Taira
programme.desc: Prelims - Tatsuro Taira looks to remain undefeated his second UFC main event against former flyweight title challenger Brandon Royval. Japan's rising star has wowed fans with his performances against the likes of Alex Perez, Carlos Hernandez, and Edgar Chairez. Now Taira sets his eyes on a win to become undeniable for a shot at the title.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Pereira vs. Hernandez
programme.desc: Prelims - Currently on an eight-fight winning streak that includes four consecutive post-fight performance bonuses, Brazils Michel Pereira is on the fast track to big things in the middleweight division, but to move to the next level, he must first get by the dangerous Anthony Hernandez in the main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas on October 19. Winner of five straight, with his last three victories ending before the final horn, Hernandez has been deadly with his submission game, as well as his striking, making him a tough puzzle to figure out for Pereira, who has been unstoppable since moving to the middleweight division a year ago.

programme.desc: UFC Connected "Origins: Kayla Harrison, Fighter Focus: Jim Miller, Ultimate Access: Chute Boxe, Day 1: Cody Garbrandt - Olympic Judo world champion Kayla Harrison details her transition into MMA, revealing her resilience through childhood abuse, and channeling her pain into athletic triumphs. The UFCs marathon man looks back at this record-breaking career and details his approach to the fight game that has seen him compete at the sports highest level for decades. Exclusive access to a special ceremony held at the original site of the Chute Boxe academy where Charles Oliveira is awarded his black belt by Chute Boxe founder Rudimar Fedrigo.
